channel.description: Mathematical Operators <expression> <operator> <expression> Addition a = 5 b = 7 c = a + b print(c) displays 12 Subtraction x = 24 y = 10 z = x - y print(z) displays 14 Multiplication a = 6 b = 7 c = a * b print(c) displays 42 Division (Whole Number) x = 27 y = 3 z = x / y print(z) displays 9.0 Division (Decimal) a = 19 b = 5 c = a / b print(c) displays
